addEntityField.comment: When you use the <apex:canvasApp> component to display a canvas app on a Visualforce page, and that page is associated with an object (placed on the page layout, for example), you can specify fields to be returned from the related object.

addEntityFields.comment: When you use the <apex:canvasApp> component to display a canvas app on a Visualforce page, and that page is associated with an object (placed on the page layout, for example), you can specify fields to be returned from the related object.

getDisplayLocation.comment: Retrieves the display location where the canvas app is being called from.

getEntityFields.comment: Retrieves the list of object fields that are returned in the signed request Record object when the component appears on a Visualforce page thatâ€™s placed on an object.

getLocationUrl.comment: Retrieves the location URL of the canvas app.

getParametersAsJSON.comment: Retrieves the current custom parameters for the canvas app. Parameters are returned as a JSON string.

getSublocation.comment: Retrieves the display sublocation where the canvas app is being called from.

setParametersAsJSON.comment: Sets the custom parameters for the canvas app.
